programme.title: Ed Koch, Mayor of New York
programme.short_synopsis: A look at the daily tasks and problems faced by New York's mayor Ed Koch.
programme.medium_synopsis: A look at the problems faced by New York's mayor Ed Koch, his weekly interrogation by the public on TV and his attempts to fight drug use and keep New York's beaches clean.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
